snippet: Olaf Olafsson, the author of the recently released war novel “Restoration,” finds time to be a senior executive at Time Warner.
abstract: Olaf Olafsson, the author of the recently released war novel Restoration, lives a dual life, writing when he is not at his day job as Time Warner's executive vice president for international and corporate strategy; his four books, which were written over the past 12 years, are characterized by meticulous attention to place and historical events.
lead_paragraph: Olaf Olafsson, the author of the recently released war novel “Restoration,” finds time to be a senior executive at Time Warner.

headline.seo: Olaf Olafsson, ‘Restoration’ Author and Time Warner Manager
headline.main: Media Deals and Novels From One Busy Mind
headline.print_headline: Media Deals And Novels From One Busy Mind
